original_text: I am your friend and I will take care of you. Men will plough your ground and they will plant seeds in it.
korean_text: 내가 돌이켜 너희와 함께 하리니 사람이 너희를 갈고 심을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and I will take care of you
and they will plant seeds in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그곳에 씨를 심을 것이다
